= email-test(1)
:doctype: manpage
:revdate: 2025-01-20

== Name

email-test - test email autolink trailing punctuation

== Description

Contact user@example.com.

In parentheses (user@example.com)

No trailing: user@example.com

URL should not capture: https://example.com.

Multiple trailing: user@example.com.,;

In braces {user@example.com}

In quotes "user@example.com"

Exclamation: user@example.com!

Punct then bold: user@example.com.*bold* text

Space then text: user@example.com more text here
